tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patents (
  patent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patent_name VARCHAR(255),
  patent_description TEXT,
  filing_date DATE,
  patent_owner VARCHAR(100),
  research_area VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE patents (
    patent_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_title VARCHAR(255),
    patent_abstract TEXT,
    patent_filing_date DATE,
    patent_owner VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE patent_inventors (
    inventor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    inventor_name VARCHAR(100),
    inventor_affiliation VARCHAR(255),
    patent_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (patent_id) REFERENCES patents(patent_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patents (
	patent_id INT,
	title VARCHAR(255),
	year_published INT,
	company_name VARCHAR(255),
	primary key (patent_id)
)

CREATE TABLE researchers (
	researcher_id INT,
	researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
	specialization VARCHAR(255),
	join_date DATE,
	primary key (researcher_id)
)

CREATE TABLE research_areas (
	area_id INT,
	area_name VARCHAR(255),
	description TEXT,
	primary key (area_id)
)

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
	project_id INT,
	project_title VARCHAR(255),
	area_id INT,
	researcher_id INT,
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE,
	foreign key (area_id) references research_areas(area_id),
	foreign key (researcher_id) references researchers(researcher_id),
	primary key (project_id)
)

CREATE TABLE patents (
    patent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT,
    publication_date DATE,
    inventor TEXT,
    assignee TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patent_description (
    patent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    abstract TEXT,
    claims TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patent_classifications (
    patent_id INT,
    classification TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE inventors (
    inventor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    specialization TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE assignees (
    assignee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    industry TEXT
)
